data.name: Sample - CrowdStrike Falcon - 2.2.4
data.description: Sample playbooks for "CrowdStrike Falcon" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Run Admin Command
workflows.description: Execute admin command on the device using its device ID.

workflows.name: Get IOCs
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all IOCs or specific IOCs based on the input parameters you have specified from CrowdStrike Falcon

workflows.name: Get User IDs List
workflows.description: List all user IDs in your customer account.

arguments.title: CrowdStrike Falcon: Get User IDs List

workflows.name: Remove Containment
workflows.description: Lift containment on that host to return its network communications to normal.

workflows.name: Detection Search
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all detection IDs or specific detection IDs based on the input parameters you have specified configured on a device on CrowdStrike Falcon.

workflows.name: Get Processes Related to IOC
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of processes from CrowdStrike Falcon which are associated with the specified IOC on given device based on the IOC type and value, device ID, and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: CrowdStrike Falcon: Get Processes Related to IOC

routes.name: Alerts -> Get Processes Related to IOC

workflows.name: Get Admin Command Result
workflows.description: Retrieves the result of the status of the admin command executed on the device from CrowdStrike Falcon RTR on the device ID you have specified.

arguments.title: CrowdStrike Falcon: Get Admin Command Result

workflows.name: Get Process Details
workflows.description: Retrieves details of a specific process from CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the process ID you have specified.

workflows.name: > Crowdstrike Falcon > Fetch
workflows.description: Fetch Content Records from Microsoft Management Activity API.

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title": "Pull Detections Created in Last X min",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "integer",
    "name": "fetch_detection_in_last_X_minutes"
  },
  {
    "title": "Severity",
    "name": "max_severity_displayname",
    "visible": true,
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "type": "multiselect",
    "options": [
      "Critical",
      "High",
      "Medium",
      "Low",
      "Informational"
    ],
    "description": "Name used in the UI to determine the severity of the detection that you want to search on CrowdStrike Falcon. You can select multiple options.Valid values include: Critical, High, Medium, Low, and Informational."
  },
  {
    "title": "Tactic",
    "name": "behaviors_tactic",
    "visible": true,
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "type": "text",
    "placeholder": "eg. Machine Learning, Malware",
    "description": "Tactic for detection filtration on CrowdStrike Falcon."
  },
  {
    "title": "Technique",
    "name": "behaviors_technique",
    "visible": true,
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "type": "text",
    "placeholder": "eg. Cloud Based ML, Sensor Based ML",
    "description": "Technique for detection filtration on CrowdStrike Falcon."
  },
  {
    "title": "Status",
    "name": "status",
    "visible": true,
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "type": "multiselect",
    "options": [
      "New",
      "In Progress",
      "True Positive",
      "False Positive",
      "Ignored"
    ],
    "description": "Current status of the detection that you want to search on CrowdStrike Falcon.You can select multiple options.Valid values include: New, In Progress, True Positive, False Positive, and Ignored."
  },
  {
    "title": "Confidence",
    "name": "max_confidence",
    "visible": true,
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "type": "integer",
    "placeholder": 75,
    "tooltip": "Value can be any integer between 1-100.",
    "description": "When a detection has more than one associated behavior with varying confidence levels, this field captures the highest confidence value of all behaviors.You can specify any integer between 1-100 in this parameter."
  },
  {
    "title": "Fetch Query",
    "name": "filter_str",
    "visible": true,
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "type": "text",
    "placeholder": "eg. hostinfo.active_directory_dn_display:'WIN-HPBKBMLLSST'",
    "description": "Filter conditions based on which you want to filter the list of detections retrieved from CrowdStrike Falcon.All parameters listed under Detection Search API > Parameters can be used as filters."
  },
  {
    "title": "Record Count",
    "name": "limit",
    "visible": true,
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "type": "integer",
    "value": 100,
    "description": "Number of term buckets to be returned in a single request.Note: You can specify the minimum number as 1 and the maximum number of 500."
  }
]

routes.name: Fetch Detections from CrowdStrike Falcon -> Copy  of Fetch Detections from CrowdStrike Falcon
Fetch Detection Details from CrowdStrike -> Set Result
Set Time Configuration -> Fetch Detections from CrowdStrike Falcon

workflows.name: Update Incidents Status
workflows.description: Updates specific incidents in CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the incidents IDs and status you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Executable List
workflows.description: List Executable files available for "run" command

workflows.name: Get Scripts List
workflows.description: List PowerShell scripts available for "runscript" command. Which can be run on the device.

workflows.name: Get Executables Details by IDs
workflows.description: Retrieves the executable using their IDs you have specified. Which will be run using "runscript" command..

arguments.title: CrowdStrike Falcon: Get Executables Details by IDs

routes.name: Alerts -> Get Executables Details by IDs

workflows.name: CrowdStrike Falcon > Ingest
workflows.description: Fetch Detections/Incidents from the Crowdstrike Falcon and Creates records in FortiSOAR.

resource.name: Detection ID: {{vars.item["detection_id"]}}

routes.name: Create Record -> Update Last Alert Fetch Macro

workflows.name: Get Detection Details
workflows.description: Retrieves details of a specific detection from CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the detection IDs you have specified.

workflows.name: Delete IOC
workflows.description: Deletes an indicator on CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the IOC type and value you have specified.

workflows.name: Detection Aggregates
workflows.description: Retrieves a count of detections by a query from CrowdStrike Falcon based on the aggregate query name and type, the field used to compute the aggregation and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Get User ID
workflows.description: Retrieves the UID of the username specified.

workflows.name: Search Incidents
workflows.description: Search for incidents by providing an FQL filter, sorting, and paging details.

workflows.name: Create IOC
workflows.description: Creates an indicator on CrowdStrike Falcon based on the IOC type and value, policy, and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Update Detection
workflows.description: Resolves and updates a detection.

workflows.name: Get Incidents Crowdstrike Score
workflows.description: Query environment wide CrowdStrike Score and return the entity data.

arguments.title: CrowdStrike Falcon: Get Incidents Crowdstrike Score

workflows.name: Hunt File
workflows.description: Hunts a file on CrowdStrike Falcon using the filehash type and value you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Usernames List
workflows.description: List the usernames (usually an email address) for all users in your customer account.

workflows.name: Update IOC
workflows.description: Updates an indicator on CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the IOC type and value and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: >> Crowdstrike > Handle Macros
workflows.description: This playbook create Microsoft Management Activity API macros if not exist.

routes.name: Check Microsoft Management Activity API Macro -> Create Microsoft Management Activity API Macro
routes.label: No

routes.name: Check CrowdStrike Falcon Macro -> Fetch Macro Current Value
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Get Macro Status -> Check Microsoft Management Activity API Macro
Fetch Macro Current Value -> Update Macro If Required

workflows.name: Get User Details
workflows.description: Retrieves the user details of specified user.

workflows.name: Get Incident Details
workflows.description: Get details on incidents by providing incident IDs.

workflows.name: Contain the Host
workflows.description: To prevent a potentially compromised host from communicating, network contain the host

workflows.name: Get Device Details
workflows.description: Retrieves details of a specific device from CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the device ID you have specified.

workflows.name: Get IOC Details
workflows.description: Retrieves details of a specific IOC from CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the IOC type and value you have specified.

workflows.name: Hunt Domain
workflows.description: Hunts a domain on CrowdStrike Falcon using the domain value you have specified. This operation retrieves a list of device IDs from CrowdStrike Falcon on which the domain was observed.

workflows.name: Download Session File
workflows.description: Get the session file.

workflows.name: Download Session File List
workflows.description: Get the list of the files available for the download

arguments.title: CrowdStrike Falcon: Download Session File List

workflows.name: Get Endpoint List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all the all endpoints or specific endpoints based on the input parameters you have specified configured on a device on CrowdStrike Falcon.

workflows.name: Get Scripts Details by IDs
workflows.description: Retrieves the scripts using their IDs you have specified. Which will be run using "runscript" command.

arguments.title: CrowdStrike Falcon: Get Scripts Details by IDs

routes.name: Alerts -> Get Scripts Details by IDs
